turns.speaker: agent
turns.utterance: Certainly! To maximize your $50 budget and focus on healthy options, I recommend meals centered around staples like beans, rice, eggs, and in-season vegetables. turns.speaker: agent

It depends on the store location, but a pound of pasta should be around $1, a large can of crushed tomatoes around $2, and ground turkey maybe $5-$7/lb. Then you can also consider egg-drop soup.
